full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/27/2023 ADDRESS REPORTS-Read Carefully UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE The Alien Registration Act, 1940, requires all resident aliens S OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE to report each change of address within 5 days of such change.
